section3.title: Fast
section3.detail: Remote Labs enables decision-makers to find the right candidates in a matter of minutes. No need for Applicant Tracking Systems, Job Boards, Hiring Managers, Recruitment Teams, and Sourcing Teams. The decentralized application will also handle payments and accounting activities.

section1.title: What do you know about our COMPANY?

details.part1: Hadisi yetu is a start-up of developers from the arweave DRC community who work together to help medium and small businesses acquire the necessary tools for new technology.
details.part2: We are a custom software development company. We provide expertise for the entire project lifecycle, from gathering and defining requirements to executing projects to successful completion.
details.part3: We specialize in Big Data and Cloud solutions, IOT, Geographic Information Systems and Mapping, Information Retrieval and Search Engines, Agri-tech.

section2.title: COMPANY VISION
section2.description: Our vision is to become the first and biggest IT Company to provide Big Data and Cloud solutions, IOT, Geographic Information Systems and Mapping, Information Retrieval.

section3.title: COMPANY MISSION
section3.description: Our vision is to become the first and biggest IT Company to provide Big Data and Cloud solutions, IOT, Geographic Information Systems and Mapping, Information Retrieval and Search Engines and Agri-tech solutions.

section4.title: OUR FOCUS
section4.description: From a theoretical point of view, agrotechnology is the technology applied to the agricultural and livestock field, mainly because it provides the methods and machinery to optimize production, focusing on the processes used in the sector to give a more efficient use of natural and artificial resources.
